{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Acelink |model=BR-6774 |revision=AD |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=new |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8065 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA6320 |wi2_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=QCA6310 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=ad |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=MU-MIMO |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ad |default_ssid= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• '''4620Mbps''' - 1-stream 802.11ad device (MCS12/16-QAM (3/4)), :• '''1733Mbps''' - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''800Mbps''' - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''7200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AD7200 WLAN Concurrent Tri-Band Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.acelink.com.tw/BR-6774AD.html Product page] ===Wireless Features=== * Comply 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ad, supporting ultra high-speed zones – as 4.6Gbps. * Supports 2.4GHz, 5GHz and 60GHz wireless networks connection simultaneously. * Support 4T4R MIMO technology in 5GHz frequency and 4T4R MIMO technology in :2.4GHz frequency, enhancing the performance and coverage range significantly. * Support 64/128-bit WEP, WPA and WPA2 securities and also 802.1x authentication. * High speed transmit and receive data rate - 1750Mbps while operating in 802.11ac :(5GHz, 80/160MHz) mode and 800Mbps while operating in 802.11n (2.4GHz) mode. :Supported Data Rate: MCS0, MCS1 (385Mbps) ~ MCS12 (4.6Gbps). * Supports WPS function for easy wireless association. ===Specifications=== *Product: WLAN Concurrent Tri-Band Gigabit Router *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 @1.7GHz Dual Core Internet Processor *WLAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 (2.4GHz) + QCA9984 (5GHz) :AD: QCA6320 (60GHz MAC/BB) + QCA6310 (60GHz RF transceiver) *MIMO Technology: 5GHz: 4T4R MIMO, 2.4GHz: 4T4R MIMO *Antenna: 4x 3dBi Dual Band external dipole antenna : 1x 3-dimensional 32-antenna-element array (60GHz) *Flash: 128MB NAND Flash *RAM: 512MB DDR3 SDRAM *Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 Gigabit Switch *Port: USB: 2x USB3.0 :WAN: 1x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps) Auto-MDI/MDI-X UTP Port :LAN: 4x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps) Auto-MDI/MDI-X UTP Port *Power: 12V, 4A Switch Power Adapter *Dimension: 202mm x 208.5mm x 50mm (HxWxD) excluding antenna ===News=== *[https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2016/01/05/qualcomm-80211ad-products-lead-way-multi-band-wi-fi-ecosystem ''Qualcomm 802.11ad Products for Multi-band Wi-Fi Ecosystem'' on '''Qualcomm'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32915-tp-link-ces-2016-announcements ''TP-LINK CES 2016 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*[[TP-LINK AD7200 (Talon)]] - ''AD7200 Multi-band Wi-Fi Router'' (802.11ac/ad) ::4620Mbps (60GHz) / 1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz) (AC2600) ::AC2600 4x4 [[Qualcomm]] MU-MIMO with single-stream 802.11ad radio ::[[Qualcomm]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, 2x USB 3.0 ports, 8x ext. antennas ===See also=== *[[List of 802.11ad Hardware]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[TP-LINK AD7200 (Talon)]] *[[Netgear R7800]] ==Images== __NOTOC__
